LanguageData.RT_C130_Vehicle_Blueprint.label: C130 Hercules
LanguageData.RT_C130_Vehicle_Blueprint.description:
A four-engine transport aircraft that requires longer runways to land and take off due to its massive size, but has unparalleled cargo capacity, also has superior range and speed.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x2, Passenger x16
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
